metadata.description: Comprehensive test dataset for extraction accuracy validation
metadata.notes: Includes edge cases, longer threads, ambiguous emails, and regional variations

emails.subject: Closing documents for 123 Main Street
emails.body:
Dear Client,

Attached are the closing documents for your purchase of 123 Main Street, Springfield. The closing is scheduled for January 15th at 2:00 PM.

Please review the HUD-1 statement and bring a certified check for $15,450.00.

Best regards,
Title Company
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Closing documents for 123 Main Street
emails.body:
Thank you for sending these. I have reviewed the documents and everything looks correct.

See you on the 15th!
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Closing documents for 123 Main Street
emails.body:
Perfect! I'll have everything ready. Please remember to bring two forms of ID.

See you then.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Offer Accepted - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body:
Great news! The sellers have accepted your offer of $485,000 for 456 Oak Avenue.

Next steps:
1. Home inspection scheduled for Friday
2. Appraisal will be ordered
3. Earnest money due by end of week

MLS# 12345678
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Offer Accepted - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body: Wonderful news! I'll get the earnest money check ready. What's the deadline for the inspection contingency?
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Offer Accepted - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body: The inspection contingency is 10 days from acceptance, so you have until January 18th. I've attached the timeline.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Offer Accepted - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body: Got it, thanks! I'll be there for the inspection on Friday.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Listing Agreement - 789 Pine Road
emails.body:
Please find attached the listing agreement for your property at 789 Pine Road.

Listing price: $325,000
Commission: 6%
Listing period: 6 months

Please sign and return at your earliest convenience.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Lease Agreement Ready - Unit 5B, 100 Apartment Way
emails.body:
Your lease agreement for Unit 5B at 100 Apartment Way is ready for signature.

Monthly rent: $1,850
Lease term: 12 months
Security deposit: $1,850

Please sign by Friday to secure your move-in date.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Home Inspection Report - 222 Elm Drive
emails.body:
Attached is the inspection report for 222 Elm Drive.

Key findings:
- HVAC needs service
- Minor roof repairs recommended
- Electrical panel up to code

Overall the property is in good condition for its age.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Escrow Instructions - 333 Birch Lane
emails.body:
Please find the escrow instructions for the purchase of 333 Birch Lane.

Purchase price: $550,000
Earnest money: $20,000
Closing date: February 1st

Wire transfer instructions are attached.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Final Walkthrough Scheduled
emails.body:
The final walkthrough for 444 Maple Street is scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM.

Please confirm you can attend.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Counter Offer Received - 555 Cedar Court
emails.body:
The sellers have submitted a counter offer for 555 Cedar Court.

Original offer: $420,000
Counter: $435,000

They are also requesting a 45-day close instead of 30. Please review and let me know how you'd like to proceed.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Counter Offer Received - 555 Cedar Court
emails.body: Let's meet in the middle at $427,500 and I can do the 45-day close. Can you send that back?
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Appraisal Complete - 666 Willow Way
emails.body:
The appraisal for 666 Willow Way has been completed.

Appraised value: $398,000
Contract price: $395,000

Good news - the property appraised above the contract price. We're cleared to proceed to closing.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Title Search Complete - 777 Spruce Street
emails.body:
We have completed the title search for 777 Spruce Street.

The title is clear with no liens or encumbrances. Title insurance commitment is attached.

Please review and let us know if you have any questions.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Congratulations! Keys Handoff for 888 Hickory Lane
emails.body:
Congratulations on your new home!

The closing went smoothly. Here are your keys and garage door openers. The sellers have left the appliance manuals in the kitchen drawer.

Enjoy your new home at 888 Hickory Lane!
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Thinking of selling your home?
emails.body:
Hi there,

I noticed your neighbor at 123 Oak Street just sold for $450,000. Have you considered selling? The market is very strong right now.

I'd be happy to provide a free market analysis for your property at 125 Oak Street.

Best,
Jane Smith, Realtor
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Purchase Agreement - Rural Route 2 Box 45
emails.body:
Please find attached the purchase agreement for the property at Rural Route 2 Box 45, Johnson County.

This 40-acre parcel includes the farmhouse, barn, and all outbuildings. Purchase price: $275,000.

Well and septic inspection scheduled for next week.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Attorney Review Period - 999 Washington Ave
emails.body:
This email confirms that attorney review has begun for the property at 999 Washington Ave.

Per New Jersey law, you have 3 business days for attorney review. I have received the contract and will review today.

Please do not schedule inspections until attorney review is complete.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: LOI Accepted - 1500 Commerce Blvd
emails.body:
Great news! The Letter of Intent for the commercial property at 1500 Commerce Blvd has been accepted.

Property details:
- 15,000 sq ft office building
- Purchase price: $2.4M
- Due diligence period: 60 days

Our attorneys will begin drafting the purchase agreement.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Lease Renewal - Suite 200, 500 Business Park
emails.body:
Your current lease for Suite 200 at 500 Business Park expires in 60 days.

We are pleased to offer the following renewal terms:
- New rent: $28/sq ft (3% increase)
- Term: 3 years
- TI allowance: $5/sq ft

Please respond by February 15th.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Repair Request Response - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body:
The sellers have agreed to the following repairs based on the inspection:

1. HVAC service and filter replacement - Seller will complete
2. Roof repair estimate of $1,500 - Seller offers $1,000 credit at closing
3. Outlet grounding - Seller will hire electrician

Please confirm this is acceptable.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: Re: Repair Request Response - 456 Oak Avenue
emails.body: That works for me. Please send the amendment and I'll sign.
emails.label: transaction

emails.subject: URGENT: Verify your account now!
emails.body:
Your account has been compromised! Click here immediately to verify your identity or your account will be suspended.

Click: http://suspicious-link.com/verify
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: You've won $1,000,000!
emails.body: Congratulations! You have been selected to receive $1,000,000 USD. To claim your prize, send us your bank details immediately.
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Free iPhone 15 Pro - Limited Time!
emails.body: You've been selected to receive a FREE iPhone 15 Pro! Just pay shipping and handling. This offer expires TODAY!
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Enlarge your portfolio today!
emails.body: Amazing investment opportunity! Double your money in just 7 days with our guaranteed returns program.
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Your package could not be delivered
emails.body: We attempted to deliver your package but failed. Click here to reschedule: http://fake-delivery.com/track
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Bitcoin opportunity - Act now!
emails.body: Make $10,000 per day trading Bitcoin from home! No experience needed. Limited spots available.
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Weight loss secret doctors don't want you to know
emails.body: Lose 30 pounds in 30 days with this one weird trick! Order now and get free shipping.
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Hot singles in your area!
emails.body: Meet attractive singles near you today! Click here to create your free profile.
emails.label: spam

emails.subject: Team meeting tomorrow
emails.body:
Hi everyone,

Reminder that we have our weekly team meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

Agenda:
- Project updates
- Q1 planning
- AOB

See you there!
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Re: Team meeting tomorrow
emails.body: Thanks for the reminder. I'll be there.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your Amazon order has shipped
emails.body:
Your order #123-456-789 has shipped and is on its way!

Estimated delivery: January 15-17
Carrier: UPS
Tracking: 1Z999AA10123456784
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Happy Birthday!
emails.body:
Happy Birthday! Hope you have a wonderful day filled with joy and celebration.

Best wishes,
The Team
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Dentist appointment reminder
emails.body:
This is a reminder of your upcoming dental appointment:

Date: January 16, 2024
Time: 2:30 PM
Doctor: Dr. Smith

Please arrive 15 minutes early.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Project status update
emails.body:
Hi team,

Here's the weekly status update:

- Phase 1: Complete
- Phase 2: In progress (75%)
- Phase 3: Starting next week

Let me know if you have questions.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Lunch plans?
emails.body: Hey! Want to grab lunch tomorrow? There's a new Italian place that opened up near the office.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your receipt from Starbucks
emails.body:
Thank you for your purchase!

Order: Grande Latte
Total: $5.75
Payment: Visa ending in 1234

Earn stars with every purchase!
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your gym membership renewal
emails.body:
Your Planet Fitness membership will auto-renew on February 1st.

Monthly fee: $22.99
Payment method: Card ending in 5678

Visit our app to update payment info.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Flight confirmation - LAX to JFK
emails.body:
Your flight is confirmed!

Flight: AA 123
Date: January 20, 2024
Departure: 8:00 AM LAX
Arrival: 4:30 PM JFK

Check in online 24 hours before departure.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your electric bill is ready
emails.body:
Your January electric bill is now available.

Amount due: $127.43
Due date: February 5, 2024

View your bill online or set up autopay.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: John Smith viewed your profile
emails.body:
John Smith, CEO at Tech Company, viewed your profile.

See who's viewing your profile and what they're looking for.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Zillow: New homes in your area
emails.body:
Based on your saved search, here are 5 new listings near Springfield:

1. 123 Main St - $450,000 - 3 bed, 2 bath
2. 456 Oak Ave - $525,000 - 4 bed, 3 bath
3. 789 Pine Rd - $375,000 - 2 bed, 2 bath

See all listings on Zillow.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: Weekly Real Estate Market Update
emails.body:
This week in real estate news:

- Interest rates holding steady at 6.5%
- New housing starts increase 5%
- Market trends for Q1 looking positive

Read more on our website.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: Congratulations! You're pre-approved for a mortgage
emails.body:
Great news! Based on your application, you are pre-approved for:

Loan amount: Up to $400,000
Rate: 6.25% (30-year fixed)
Monthly payment estimate: $2,463

This pre-approval is valid for 90 days. Start house hunting today!
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: We buy houses CASH - any condition!
emails.body:
Tired of waiting to sell your house? We buy houses in ANY condition for CASH!

- No repairs needed
- Close in 7 days
- No realtor fees

Get your free, no-obligation offer today.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: NAR Membership Renewal Due
emails.body:
Your National Association of Realtors membership expires on January 31st.

Renewal fee: $156
Local dues: $275
MLS access: $99

Renew now to maintain your MLS access and Realtor designation.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: HOA Meeting Notice - 123 Main Street
emails.body:
Notice of Annual HOA Meeting

Date: February 15, 2024
Time: 7:00 PM
Location: Community Center

Agenda includes:
- 2024 Budget approval
- Pool renovation proposal
- Election of board members

All homeowners are encouraged to attend.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: Maintenance Request Completed - Unit 5B
emails.body:
Your maintenance request has been completed.

Unit: 5B, 100 Apartment Way
Issue: Leaking faucet in bathroom
Resolution: Replaced washer and tightened connection

Please let us know if you have any further issues.
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: Lower your monthly payment - Refinance now!
emails.body:
Interest rates have dropped! You could save $300/month by refinancing your mortgage.

Current rate: 7.5%
New rate available: 6.25%
Estimated savings: $3,600/year

No cost to apply. Get your free quote today!
emails.label: edge_case

emails.subject: Your lab results are ready
emails.body:
Your recent lab results from January 15th are now available in your patient portal.

Please log in to view your results or schedule a follow-up appointment if needed.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: New on Netflix this week
emails.body:
Check out what's new on Netflix!

- New movie: The Big Adventure
- New series: Mystery Manor Season 2
- Documentary: Planet Earth III

Watch now on Netflix.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your January statement is ready
emails.body:
Your monthly statement for account ending in 4567 is now available.

Period: January 1-31, 2024
Ending balance: $5,234.56

View your statement online.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Severe Weather Alert for your area
emails.body:
Winter Storm Warning in effect for Springfield County.

Expected: 6-10 inches of snow
Timing: Tonight through tomorrow morning

Stock up on essentials and avoid travel if possible.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your car is due for service
emails.body:
According to our records, your 2022 Honda Accord is due for its 30,000 mile service.

Recommended service:
- Oil change
- Tire rotation
- Brake inspection

Schedule your appointment online or call us.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Parent-Teacher Conference Schedule
emails.body:
Dear Parents,

Parent-teacher conferences are scheduled for February 5-6.

Please sign up for a time slot using the link below. Each conference is 15 minutes.

We look forward to meeting with you!
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your grocery order is on its way
emails.body:
Great news! Your Instacart order is being delivered.

Shopper: Maria
Estimated arrival: 2:30 PM

Track your delivery in the app.
emails.label: normal

emails.subject: Your auto insurance policy renewal
emails.body:
Your auto insurance policy renews on March 1, 2024.

Current premium: $1,245/year
Payment due: February 15, 2024

Log in to review your coverage or make changes.
emails.label: normal
